descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic gets by Anthony Davis and elevates to throw down a dunk for the Trail Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nurkic blows by AD for a slam) 2022/02/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nurkic blows by AD for a slam

videos.description: Malik Monk gets inside and tosses a nice lob to Anthony Davis for the dunk in traffic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Monk, AD connect on alley-oop jam) 2022/02/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Monk, AD connect on alley-oop jam

videos.description: LeBron James shoots a 3-pointer that hits the back of the rim and bounces way up high, but still goes in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron gets a lucky bounce on this 3) 2022/02/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron gets a lucky bounce on this 3

videos.description: Talen Horton-Tucker tosses a lob up to a cutting Anthony Davis for the two-handed stuff in the lane for the Lakers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (THT finds AD for a nice alley-oop) 2022/02/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: THT finds AD for a nice alley-oop

videos.description: Anfernee Simons knocks down a big 3-pointer with Anthony Davis in his airspace to extend the Blazers' late lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Simons cashes out on huge 3 for Blazers) 2022/02/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Simons cashes out on huge 3 for Blazers
